item.title: MambaTree: Tree Topology is All You Need in State Space Model
item.description: MambaTree: A novel tree-topology-based state space model surpasses existing methods by dynamically generating input-aware topologies for enhanced long-range dependencies in vision and language.

item.title: Unleashing Region Understanding in Intermediate Layers for MLLM-based Referring Expression Generation
item.description: Unlocking intermediate layers in MLLMs improves referring expression generation by enhancing accuracy and detail while reducing hallucinations.
